concept.title: CSS Classes
concept.shortdesc: Use available CSS classes to customize your Apps’ display.

conbody.p: Available for Chat, Comments, Live Blog, Reviews, and Sidenotes.

Use CSS to customize your Livefyre Apps for a more complete integration with your page, by simply overriding the default App CSS with your own stylesheet. This section describes available CSS customizations.

section.title: Editor CSS
section.p: Use these classes to change the post editor interface.

section.p: You can also edit styles in the App configuration itself, including the editor field background color, and the font color, size, and family of the text that appears inside the editor.
